comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for your information about Jose Emilio Rabasa.  According to the New York Times (May 20, 1914), Rabasa, Miguel Fernandez de la Regata and Agustin Rodriguez were delegates to the Niagara Falls peace conference in 1914.
